item.title: Deep pothole near center line, 11th February
item.description:
While driving north towards the Shell roundabout, the pothole is close to the center line but deep enough to need active avoidance to avoid vehicle damage. It is just before the first left turn down the hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Painswick Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
